TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClientChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class HttpClientChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannelSender, ISecurableChannel
type HttpClientChannel = class inherit BaseChannelWithProperties interface IChannelSender interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 針對遠端呼叫實作使用 HTTP 通訊協定傳輸訊息的用戶端通道。

span.span: Implements a client channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 通道傳輸郵件，跨越遠端界限 （例如，之間電腦或應用程式定義域）。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers or application domains). 類別將使用 HTTP 通訊協定的訊息傳輸。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. .NET Framework 遠端基礎結構會使用通道來傳輸遠端呼叫。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 當用戶端呼叫遠端物件，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然後，它會還原序列化，並處理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何傳回的值是經由伺服器通道，且由用戶端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要執行額外處理的訊息，用戶端中，您可以指定的實作透過所處理的所有訊息傳遞。To perform additional processing of messages on the client-side, you can specify an implementation of the through which all messages processed by the are passed. 根據預設，使用 SOAP 格式子，將所有訊息都序列化。By default, the uses a SOAP formatter to serialize all messages. A物件中具有相關聯的組態屬性可以在設定執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞集合建構函式）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱 < [ 通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設定遠端處理伺服器和其用戶端。The following code example shows how to use a to set up a remoting server and its client. 此範例包含三個部分：The example contains three parts: - 在伺服器A server - 用戶端A client - 伺服器和用戶端所使用的遠端物件A remote object used by the server and the client 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/server.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/server.cs#40)] 下列程式碼範例會示範此伺服器的用戶端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#10)] 下列程式碼範例顯示的伺服器和用戶端使用的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CPP/common.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpClientChannel/CS/common.cs#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數來`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.
A that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。Every registered channel has a unique name. 名稱用來呼叫時，擷取特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前通道的優先權。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 整數，表示指派給通道的優先權。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 優先順序會控制競爭的用戶端連線到指定的端點; 中的順序較低優先順序通道前，連線更高的優先順序通道。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 預設優先權為 1;允許使用負數的優先順序。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

span.span: The URL to which the new sink will deliver messages.
Can be .

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 遠端主機的通道資料物件，新接收應該將訊息傳遞至遠端主機。

span.span: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.
Can be .

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，包含新通道訊息接收的 URI，此 URI 傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 傳回通道訊息接收，其傳遞訊息給指定 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 通道訊息接收，會傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回通道訊息接收傳遞訊息給指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收器做為目標。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. 請`url`或是`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道屬性用來設定在執行階段的通道。Channel properties are used to configure the channel at run time. 如需可能的通道屬性和範例的清單，請參閱 < [ 通道和格式子組態屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For a list of possible channel properties and an example, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
